style.name: enum_alarm
style.description: alarm/bad state for enumerated parameters - e.g. unlocked

style.name: enum_deselected
style.description: deselected state for enumerated parameters

style.name: enum_normal
style.description: normal state for enumerated parameters - e.g. 625 detected within a usually 625 system. Used (in preference to enum_ok) for writable parameters

style.name: enum_notimportant
style.description: not important state for enumerated parameters - e.g. where you need to show a value but that it's not relevant or important in this context

style.name: enum_notnormal
style.description: not normal state for enumerated parameters - e.g. 525 detected within a usually 625 system. Used (in preference to enum_warning) for writable parameters

style.name: enum_ok
style.description: ok/good state for enumerated parameters - e.g. locked. Used (in preference to enum_normal) for readonly parameters

style.name: enum_selected
style.description: selected state for enumerated parameters

style.name: enum_unknown
style.description: When a state is unknown

style.name: enum_warning
style.description: warning state for enumerated parameters. Used (in preference to enum_notnormal) for readonly parameters

style.name: field_modified
style.description: Shows that a field in an editor has a value that has been modified and should be saved

style.name: field_unmodified
style.description: Shows that a field in an editor has a value that has not been modified
